content: 52 stitches decrease round 10 k1 k2tog to end of round 7 stitches decrease round 2-4 knit 3 rounds total all sizes resume decrease round 5 k2tog to end of cut yarn leaving a 12 tail round 17 20 23 26 stitches insert needle to first stitch of round and bind off decrease round 6-7 knit 2 rounds stitches pulling through like a drawstring total weave in ends block and enjoy size 1 decrease round 8 k1 k2tog repeat to end of round 9 stitches size 2 decrease round 8 k2tog to end of round 10 stitches decrease round 9 knit decrease round 10 k2 around to get to 5 stitches size 3 decrease round 8 k1 k2tog repeat to end of round 12 stitches decrease round 9 knit decrease round 10 k2tog to end of round 6 stitches westwood beanie ⓒ 2022 by amber hastings all rights reserved 2 1 e z i s 3 westwood beanie ⓒ 2022 by amber hastings all rights reserved 2 e z i s westwood beanie ⓒ 2022 by amber hastings all rights reserved 4 3 e z i s westwood beanie ⓒ 2022 by amber hastings all rights reserved 5 4 e z i s westwood beanie ⓒ 2022 by amber hastings all rights reserved 6
